heading: softbank bails out first virtual
subheading: the holding company will pay us$6 million to buy 10 million of the internet commerce firm's newly issued common shares.
author: reuters
text: internet commerce company softbank will buy 10 million of first virtual's newly issued common shares for us$6 million, or 60 cents each.first virtual, a maker of internet marketing software, also agreed to issue additional common shares after it converts preferred shares upon which softbank has purchase options, and after softbank acquires $1.5 million in first virtual debt.first virtual said last month that it would not be able to fund its expenses past april if it did not get a the completion of the bailout lifted first virtual's but the stock had been battered recently by the earlier announcement, as the holders of first virtual's 8 million outstanding shares learned that the bailout would hurt their share value.first virtual said the stock-diluting deal with softbank was needed because it had been unable to get extra capital since filing its annual report on 27 march.
